column4: i've installed basic development packages, they don't have man pages. which package has man pages for various C functions?
anyone knows the package name for man pages for c functions?
it comes with almost every unix. especially ubuntu.
but this fresh install of ubuntu doesn't have even the printf
as you can see, printf is a program. you have to use the correct number, for example: man 3 printf
yeah, that's what I'm telling you know
No manual entry for malloc in section 3
i don't even have the C's printf man page
